Wisdom: احْذَرْ كُلَّ عَمَلٍ إِذَا سُئِلَ عَنْهُ صَاحِبُهُ [عَامِلُهُ‏] اسْتَحْيَا مِنْهُ وَأَنْكَرَهُ
enWisdom: Be wary of every action which, when its doer is asked about it, he feels ashamed and denies it

Wisdom: احْذَرْ مِنْ كُلِّ عَمَلٍ يُعْمَلُ فِي السِّرِّ وَيُسْتَحْيَا مِنْهُ فِي الْعَلَانِيَةِ
enWisdom: Be wary of every action that is done in private and causes embarrassment in public

Wisdom: احْذَرْ كُلَّ قَوْلٍ وَفِعْلٍ يُؤَدِّي إِلَى فَسَادِ الْآخِرَةِ وَالدِّينِ
enWisdom: Be cautious of every statement or action that will lead to the spoiling of your Hereafter and religion

Wisdom: احْذَرْ كُلَّ عَمَلٍ يَرْضَاهُ عَامِلُهُ لِنَفْسِهِ وَيَكْرَهُهُ لِعَامَّةِ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
enWisdom: Be wary of every action that the doer is pleased to perform himself but hates Muslims at large to perform

Wisdom: احْذَرُوا سُوءَ الْأَعْمَالِ وَغُرُورَ الْآمَالِ وَنَفَادَ الْأَمَلِ [الْمَهَلِ‏] وَهُجُومَ الْأَجَلِ
enWisdom: Be wary of bad deeds, deceptive aspirations, loss of hope and the sudden coming of death

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَفِعْلَ الْقَبِيحِ فَإِنَّهُ يُقَبِّحُ ذِكْرَكَ وَيُكْثِرُ وِزْرَكَ
enWisdom: You must keep away from evil action, for indeed it dishonours your reputation and increases your burden

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَكُلَّ عَمَلٍ يُنَفِّرُ عَنْكَ حُرّاً أَوْ يُذِلُّ لَكَ قَدْراً أَوْ يَجْلِبُ عَلَيْكَ شَرّاً أَوْ تَحْمِلُ بِهِ إِلَى الْقِيَامَةِ وِزْراً
enWisdom: Keep away from every act that repels the freeman from you, or lowers your status, or brings harm upon you, or because of which you have to bear a burden on the Day of Judgment

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنْ عَمِلْتَ لِلدُّنْيَا خَسِرْتَ صَفْقَتَكَ
enWisdom: If you work for this world, your transaction will have made a loss

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ لَنْ تَلْقَى اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ بِعَمَلٍ أَضَرَّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ حُبِّ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Verily you will never meet Allah, the Glorified, with an action more harmful to you than love for this world

Wisdom: بِئْسَ الْعَمَلُ الْمَعْصِيَةُ
enWisdom: Avoid disobeying Allah and you will be successful

Wisdom: بِئْسَ الذُّخْرُ فِعْلُ الشَّرِّ
enWisdom: How bad a provision evil action is!

Wisdom: ثَمَرَةُ الْعَمَلِ السَّيِّئِ كَأَصْلِهِ
enWisdom: The fruit of evil action is [evil] like its root

Wisdom: جِمَاعُ الشَّرِّ فِي الِاغْتِرَارِ بِالْمَهَلِ وَالِاتِّكَالِ عَلَى الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: The consolidation of evil is in being deceived by respite [from chastisement] and reliance on [one’s own] action

Wisdom: سُوءُ الْفِعْلِ دَلِيلُ لُؤْمِ الْأَصْلِ
enWisdom: Evil action is evidence of a vile origin

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْأَفْعَالِ مَا جَلَبَ الْآثَامَ
enWisdom: The worst action is that which results in sins

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْعَمَلِ مَا أَفْسَدْتَ بِهِ مَعَادَكَ
enWisdom: The worst act is that by which you spoil your Hereafter

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ مَخْدُوعٍ بِالْأَمَلِ مُضَيِّعٍ لِلْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: How many a person is deluded by hopes, [and] ends up wasting his actions!

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ لِلدُّنْيَا خَسِرَ
enWisdom: One who works for this world makes a loss

Wisdom: مَنْ يُقَصِّرْ فِي الْعَمَلِ يَزْدَدْ فَتْرَةً
enWisdom: One who falls short in his action increases his lassitude

Wisdom: مَنْ قَصَّرَ فِي الْعَمَلِ ابْتَلَاهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ بِالْهَمِّ وَلَا حَاجَةَ لِلَّهِ فِيمَنْ لَيْسَ لَهُ فِي نَفْسِهِ وَمَالِهِ نَصِيبٌ
enWisdom: Whoever falls short in [his] action, Allah, the Glorified, afflicts him with distress; and Allah has no need for one who spares nothing of himself or his wealth [for attaining His pleasure]

Wisdom: مَنْ قَصَّرَ عَنْ فِعْلِ الْخَيْرِ خَسِرَ وَنَدِمَ
enWisdom: One who is falls short in performing good deeds, loses and regrets

Wisdom: رُبَّ صَغِيرٍ مِنْ عَمَلِكَ تَسْتَكْبِرُهُ
enWisdom: Many a small action [that you do] is considered by you as being great

Wisdom: فَاعِلُ الشَّرِّ شَرٌّ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: The doer of evil is worse than the evil [itself]

Wisdom: التَّقْصِيرُ فِي الْعَمَلِ لِمَنْ وَثِقَ بِالثَّوَابِ عَلَيْهِ غَبْنٌ
enWisdom: Falling short in action, for the one who is certain of its reward, is foolishness
